title: IRenderMaterial.FitWidth
description: Gets or sets whether to stretch the width of the appearance texture to the selected entity when mapping the appearance.
returns: True to stretch the width of the appearance texture to the selected entity, false to not
remarks:
Call
IRenderMaterial::FitHeight
to get or set whether to stretch the height of the appearance texture to the selected entity.
To stretch width and height of the appearance texture yourself, call
IRenderMaterial::Width
and
IRenderMaterial::Height
.
